item.title: Natalie add a quote by Amy Chua
item.description: "Everything I've ever done that's valuable is something I was afraid to try." -- Amy Chua

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Some knowledge is too heavy...you cannot bear it...your Father will carry it until you are able." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Even as the angry vengeful thoughts boiled through me, I saw the sin of them. Jesus Christ had died for this man; was I going to ask for more? Lord Jesus, I prayed, forgive me and help me to forgive him....Jesus, I cannot forgive him. Give me your forgiveness....And so I discovered that it is not on our forgiveness any more than on our goodness that the world's healing hinges, but on His. When He tells us to love our enemies, He gives along with the command, the love itself." -- Corrie Ten Boom

item.title: Natalie add a quote by Corrie Ten Boom
item.description: "Whenever we cannot love in the old, human way . . . God can give us the perfect way." -- Corrie Ten Boom
